item.title: How would i make a command that
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:5, topic:180838”]if(command.startsWith(“xteleall”)) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.playerRights = 3;//only playerRights admin or above can use
castOn.teleportToX = absX;
castOn.teleportToY = absY;
}
}
}[/quote]
Wow, thanks, it works great!

item.title: How would i make a command that
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“xteleall”)) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.playerRights = 3;//only playerRights admin or above can use
castOn.teleportToX = absX;
castOn.teleportToY = absY;
}
}
}

item.source: How would i make a command that

item.title: How would i make a command that
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

Well its kinda like this

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights > 0)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					p.teleportToX = absX;
					p.teleportToY = absY;
					p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
					p.updateRequired = true;
					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "
							+ playerName);
				} else {
					sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
			}
		}[/code]
